translation.you_have_received_an_email: You have received the following email:
translation.answer_the_email_and_cover_topics: Reply to the email. Write something about all following topics:
translation.writing_instructions: Before writing, think about a suitable order of topics, a suitable subject, a suitable salutation, introduction and a suitable conclusion.
translation.welcome_banner_copy:
Hi, it's [Anatoli](https://www.x.com/makaroni4), maker of the **Email Writing Trainer**! üëã
 I built this to practice before taking an official [TELC B1 German Test](https://www.telc.net/sprachpruefungen/deutsch/zertifikat-deutsch-telc-deutsch-b1), which has a written assignment about responding to an E-mail. This trainer mimics the exact structure of the TELC E-mail test.
The E-mail is gerenated via Chat GPT, so you'll have to set your API key in the settings ([a note on where to get API key](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-api-key)). 

 EWT "supports" (it's funny to write supports, because it's all AI-generated) the following languages:
translation.set_api_key: Please, set Open AI API key
translation.restart_alert_question: Are you sure you want to restart the exam?
translation.cant_generate_exam: Chat GPT API hasn't responden with a valid exam 3 times in a row. Please, try again in a minute.
translation.example_letter:
Hi Emma!

Im doing wel, thanks for asking. It's really nice to hear you! 

I'd love join you for the movie night this Friday. New romantic comedy sounds like a lot of fun. 

As for movie recommendations I recently watched a great drama called "The Silver Lining" ‚Äì you might enjoy it. 

thanks for the invite and I apreciate your thoughtfulness about snacks. I'm good with anything, so surprise me! 

Looking forward to catching up with you and the gang. Take care! Lisa
translation.example_email:
Hey Lisa! üå∏üåû

I hope this email finds you well. It's been a while since we last caught up. How have you been? üíï

I wanted to reach out and invite you to a movie night at my place this Friday. We're planning on watching the new romantic comedy that everyone's been talking about. üé•üçø It would be great if you could join us!

By the way, have you seen any good movies lately? I'm always looking for recommendations. üé¨

Let me know if you can make it and if there's anything specific you'd like us to prepare for snacks. Can't wait to catch up with you! üòä

Take care,
Emma

It's really nice to hear you!
I'd love join you for the movie night this Friday.
New romantic comedy sounds like a lot of fun.
As for movie recommendations I recently watched a great drama called "The Silver Lining" ‚Äì you might enjoy it.
thanks for the invite and I apreciate your thoughtfulness about snacks.
I'm good with anything, so surprise me!
Looking forward to catching up with you and the gang.
example_verified_sentences: I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
It's really nice to hear from you!
I'd love to join you for the movie night this Friday.
A new romantic comedy sounds like a lot of fun.
As for movie recommendations, I recently watched a great drama called "The Silver Lining" ‚Äì you might enjoy it.
Thanks for the invite and I appreciate your thoughtfulness about snacks.
I'm good with anything, so surprise me!
Looking forward to catching up with you and the gang.
